query: mutation PutUser($fullName: String, $email: String, $password: String, $imgUrl: Upload, $role: String, $phoneNumber: String, $address: String, $userId: ID!, $username: String) {putUser(fullName: $fullName, email: $email, password: $password, imgUrl: $imgUrl, role: $role, phoneNumber: $phoneNumber, address: $address, UserId: $userId, username: $username) {message}}
